00039 int rect_collide(SDL_Rect a , SDL_Rect b)
00040 {
00041         if(b.x + b.w < a.x)     return 0;       //just checking if their
00042         if(b.x > a.x + a.w)     return 0;       //bounding boxes even touch
00043 
00044         if(b.y + b.h < a.y)     return 0;
00045         if(b.y > a.y + a.h)     return 0;
00046 
00047         return 1;                               //bounding boxes intersect
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 controller * rect_collide_all(SDL_Rect rect,controller * selfp,int number)
00052 {
00053     number+=1;
00054     unsigned int occur=0;
00055     unsigned int size = resources::control.size();
00056 
00057     SDL_Rect r1= rect;
00058     std::vector<controller*> a = resources::control;
00059 
00060     for(unsigned int i=0;i < size;i+=1)
00061     {
00062 
00063         if (resources::control.at(i)==NULL)
00064             continue;
00065 
00066         if ( rect_collide(rect, resources::control.at(i)->rect ) )
00067         {
00068 
00069             SDL_Rect r2= resources::control.at(i)->rect;
00070 
00071             if ( resources::control.at(i)==selfp)
00072                 continue;
00073             else
00074             {
00075                 if (resources::control.at(i)->no_collide)
00076                     continue;
00077 
00078                 return resources::control.at(i);
00079             }
00080         }
00081 
00082     }
00083 
00084     return NULL;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int get_distance(int x1,int y1,int x2,int y2)
00088 {
00089     return sqrt( ((x2 - x1)^2) + ((y2 - y1)^2) );
00090 }
